mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.orderid AS "order.id", a.productid AS "productid", a.price AS "price", a.num AS "num", a.money AS "money", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN a_order b ON b.id = a.orderid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO a_order_detail( id, orderid, productid, price, num, money, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{order.id}, #{productid}, #{price}, #{num}, #{money}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE a_order_detail SET orderid = #{order.id}, productid = #{productid}, price = #{price}, num = #{num}, money = #{money}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
